name: part_004
file: tmp_【＃不知火フレア生誕祭 】3D Singing Live！誕生日だし一緒に盛り上がろう！ 【ホロライブ⧸不知火フレア】 [_rJhAn6ZPuU]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: Flare and Noel chat on stage about the performance, Noel guesting, and reading audience comments.
Flare and Noel hold a photo shoot on stage in their 'NSSS' outfits, trying various poses suggested by the audience.

subtitles.original: というわけでですね、
subtitles.english: And so,

subtitles.original: 今回あの、やっぱりね、ノエルちゃんをちょっとゲストにお呼びしたいなと思って、
subtitles.english:
I really wanted to invite Noel-chan
as a guest for this event,

subtitles.original: え、誰が地獄やねんな。
subtitles.english: Hey, who are you calling "hell"?

subtitles.original: 確かに地獄だったけども...（笑）
subtitles.english: It certainly was hell, though... (laughs)

subtitles.original: みんなのコメント見てみようよ。
subtitles.english: Let's take a look at the comments.

subtitles.original: え、すごいパチパチって書いてある！
subtitles.english: Oh, look at all the clapping!

subtitles.original: ありがとう！拍手拍手！てぇてぇも見たよ！
subtitles.english: Thank you! Claps! I see "teetee" comments too!

subtitles.original: ありがとうございます。ふふ、頑張りました。
subtitles.english: Thank you very much. Hehe, we did our best.

subtitles.original: しかしどこまでが本当なんだろう、このコメント。
subtitles.english: I wonder how many of these comments are real.

subtitles.original: え、なになに、なんでよ、本物でしょよ！
subtitles.english: Eh, what? Why would you say that? They're real!

subtitles.original: でもね、ノエルちゃんと一緒にずっと歌いたかったんだけど、
subtitles.english:
But you know, I've always wanted to sing
with Noel-chan...

subtitles.original: ノエルちゃんが...私がね、ノエルちゃんが歌いやすい曲と...
subtitles.english:
Noel-chan... I tried to find a song
that would be easy for her to sing...

subtitles.original: おめえの話に入んだよ！（笑）
subtitles.english: Get in on the conversation! (laughs)

subtitles.original: 主人公はね、フレアだから、団長ちょっとガヤに...（笑）
subtitles.english:
Flare is the star, so the Captain
will just provide backup... (laughs)

subtitles.original: ノエルちゃんと一緒に歌いたい曲がちょっと二曲ぐらいあったんだけど、
subtitles.english:
There were about two songs
I wanted to sing with her,

subtitles.original: どっちがいい？って聞いたら、ノエルちゃん何故かこっちを選んだんだよね。
subtitles.english:
and when I asked which was better,
she chose this one for some reason.

subtitles.original: いや、だってさ、てぇてぇじゃん、てぇてぇじゃん、
subtitles.english: Well, because it's so precious, right? Precious!

subtitles.original: てぇてぇからさ、歌いたいじゃん、歌えなくてもね！
subtitles.english:
It's so precious that I wanted to sing it,
even if I couldn't do it well!

subtitles.original: いや、でもね、その気持ちが私はすごい嬉しかった。
subtitles.english: But you know, that sentiment made me really happy.

subtitles.original: 頑張った、頑張った、頑張った！これめっちゃね、伝わった、頑張った感は出たでしょ。
subtitles.english:
We tried hard! That effort definitely came through,
don't you think?

subtitles.original: 頑張った！しゅっしゅっしゅ。
subtitles.english: We did our best! Swish, swish, swish.

subtitles.original: 動きだけでもぴょんぴょんと。
subtitles.english: We were hopping around with just our movements.

subtitles.original: でもやっぱ歌いながらさ、ちょっとムズい！ってなったけど、
subtitles.english: But while singing, it was like, "This is hard!"

subtitles.original: 唐突にさ、ノエルちゃんにも唐突にお願いしたからさ、
subtitles.english: I asked Noel-chan quite suddenly too,

subtitles.original: 突貫工事だった、ごめんね、と思って。
subtitles.english: so it was a rush job. I felt bad about that.

subtitles.original: 速いところやっぱ噛んじゃった。
subtitles.english: I definitely tripped over the fast parts.

subtitles.original: いやー、ムリだー！でも、練習の時の方がいけたじゃん！
subtitles.english: It's impossible! But we did better in practice!

subtitles.original: 最初の方の中ではいけたやん！って思ったの。
subtitles.english: I thought we did okay in the beginning!

subtitles.original: 頑張って練習しました。
subtitles.english: I practiced really hard.

subtitles.original: 二回目のやつがちょっとカクカクってなっちゃって、
subtitles.english: The second one got a bit jerky,

subtitles.original: 本当にお邪魔してます、ありがとうございます。
subtitles.english: so I'm really sorry for intruding. Thank you.

subtitles.original: ううん、ノエルちゃん、ありがとうね、来てくれて。
subtitles.english: No, Noel-chan, thank you so much for coming.

subtitles.original: でですね、今回このNSSSの衣装っていうのが、滅多にないと思うので、
subtitles.english:
And so, since we rarely get to wear
these NSSS outfits together,

subtitles.original: 今日はノエフレで写真撮影会をちょっぴりだけ時間取らせてもらおうかなって思って。
subtitles.english:
I thought we'd take a little time
for a Noe-Fure photo shoot today.

subtitles.original: 私の思い出作りに付き合って！
subtitles.english: Join me in making some memories!

subtitles.original: いっぱい撮って、ハッシュタグで思い出をいっぱいツイートしてくれたら嬉しい！
subtitles.english:
Take lots of photos and tweet them
with the hashtag. That would make me happy!

subtitles.original: レッツ！どうする？
subtitles.english: Let's go! What should we do?

subtitles.original: あのさ、さっきのリハーサルでさ、やってたやつやろうよ。
subtitles.english:
Hey, let's do that thing we did
in the rehearsal earlier.

subtitles.original: みんなオルタナティブ好きというかなんか、
subtitles.english: Everyone likes that "Alternative" vibe...

subtitles.original: クールな私とノエフレちょっと見てて。
subtitles.english: Take a look at the cool version of us.

subtitles.original: ちょっとかっこよく、かっこよく写して。
subtitles.english: Make us look cool, capture it coolly.

subtitles.original: かっこいいじゃん！やっぱ背中合わせって神なんだよね。
subtitles.english: We look cool! Back-to-back is just divine.

subtitles.original: こうやって手を差し伸べる感じ。
subtitles.english: Like this, reaching out our hands.

subtitles.original: ちょっとプルプルしてきた。さっきの疲れが。
subtitles.english: I'm starting to shake. From exhaustion earlier.

subtitles.original: どう？ノエルちゃんもうちょっと反って。あ、いい！もうちょっと反って。
subtitles.english:
How's this? Noel-chan, lean back more. Ah, good!
A bit more.

subtitles.original: 撮れた撮れた！かっこよく撮れた？
subtitles.english: Got it! Did it look cool?

subtitles.original: あとさ、もう一個あったじゃん。もう一個やってもらおうよ。
subtitles.english: There was one more, right? Let's do another one.

subtitles.original: そう、これね、やっぱライブをしてる...うーん！
subtitles.english: Right, this one. Since we're doing a live... Hngh!

subtitles.original: 待って、ノエルちゃん体硬い！
subtitles.english: Wait, Noel-chan, your body is so stiff!

subtitles.original: 来てる来てる？どう、これできてる？みんなできてる？
subtitles.english:
Is it working? How is it? Are we doing it?
Everyone, are we?

subtitles.original: 足はダメ！ちょっとアップして、引っ込むな、引っ込むな！やめろやめろ！
subtitles.english:
Not the legs! Zoom in... don't pull back!
Stop, stop it!

subtitles.original: 愛がちょっと、裏返しの。ドスダイアーの中の闇みたいな。
subtitles.english:
The love is a bit... inside out. Like the
darkness within.

subtitles.original: ちょっと見ちゃいけないものが...下の部分は見せちゃいけない部分だったね。
subtitles.english:
There's something we shouldn't see...
The lower half was off-limits.

subtitles.original: これなんか、みんなにもコメントとか、せっかくだからどんなポーズがいいか聞きましょう。
subtitles.english:
Let's ask everyone in the comments
what kind of poses they want to see.

subtitles.original: 今草しか生えてないよ。草。草。草。
subtitles.english: Only "grass" (lol) is growing now. Lol. Lol. Lol.

subtitles.original: 芝刈り機やって、芝刈り機。
subtitles.english: Do the lawnmower, the lawnmower.

subtitles.original: 芝刈り機！ドゥルドゥルドゥル...わぁ！
subtitles.english: Lawnmower! Vroom vroom vroom... waah!

subtitles.original: なんでちょっと芸人になっちまうんだ。
subtitles.english: Why are we turning into comedians?

subtitles.original: ハイタッチ、ハイタッチ。でもちょっとカウンターバグがあるかも。
subtitles.english:
High touch, high touch. But there might be
a counter bug.

subtitles.original: エイ！エイ！エイ！頑張って！見えざる壁が...
subtitles.english: Ei! Ei! Ei! Do your best! An invisible wall...

subtitles.original: でもね、付いてますから。気持ちは付いてるから。
subtitles.english: But we're connected. Our hearts are connected.

subtitles.original: あとは？おお、あ、タイタニック！タイタニック！
subtitles.english: What else? Oh, Titanic! Titanic!

subtitles.original: ルルルル...あ、私身長一緒なんでちょっと...
subtitles.english:
Lululu... Ah, our heights are the same,
so it's a bit...

subtitles.original: 見えなくなっちゃった。それこそコスプレイヤーのあれよ。
subtitles.english: I've disappeared. That's a total cosplayer move.

subtitles.original: どう？タイタニック！沈没しちゃう。運営さんが頑張った。
subtitles.english: How's that? Titanic! We're sinking. The staff worked hard.

subtitles.original: あ、ノエルちゃん逆やって、逆！やるやるやる！
subtitles.english: Ah, Noel-chan, swap positions! Let's do it!

subtitles.original: ちょっと足、これ...足が！プルプル...
subtitles.english: The legs... my legs! They're shaking...

subtitles.original: あとは？電車ごっこやる？私先頭！
subtitles.english: What else? Should we play train? I'll be the lead!

subtitles.original: 見てて、プップー！プップー！
subtitles.english: Watch this! Choo choo! Choo choo!

subtitles.original: 目的地どこだこれ？
subtitles.english: Where is this train even heading?

subtitles.original: 何がいいの？でもさ、団長昨日ほら、お風呂でさ、ドライブ...
subtitles.english:
What's good? But Captain, yesterday in the bath,
remember the "drive"...
